name: Shatter Box
description:
INSTRUCTIONS
  • WASD/arrow keys to move, space/shift to dash
  • dash to break other cubes
  • Done for Ludum Dare compo (MY FIRST COMPO! WOOHOO!). I am now ded.
TIME-LAPSE POTENTIAL FUTURE TASKS

- Bounce off walls

- Power-ups to extend boost/give the ability to jump

- More levels 

- More enemy variation

- Boss every 5 levels
